lenders.name: UIUC Legacy Fund
lenders.loan_because: every human being has the right to credit.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a means of giving back to the community, the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign chapter of the National Organization for Business and Engineering (NOBE) holds an annual conference called "Micro-Loans. Macro-Impact."  The conference was first held on the UIUC campus in the fall of 2008.  Its purpose is to raise awareness of microcredit and to demonstrate the ease with which students and community members can contribute to the success of poor entrepreneurs around the globe.  We would like to thank the IEEE, the Illinois Microfinance Group, and the Illinois Finance Club for co-hosting the event in 2009.

For more information about NOBE or the conference, please visit our website below.

lenders.name: Solstice Vacation Home
lenders.loan_because: We strive to provide the most socially and environmentally conscious vacation destination available. The deposit checks we receive can do more good with Kiva than sitting in a conventional bank. In the end, ALL of the rent is donated to charities supporting basic human needs and the environment.
lenders.occupational_info:
Solstice is a modern vacation rental on Long Island in the southern Bahamas. Our 10-acre property includes two houses nestled in a tropical forest with stunning views overlooking their own private cove with a sandy beach. Surrounded by hundreds of acres of undeveloped wilderness and two miles of wild coastline, Solstice is the ultimate place to get away from it all. 

Whether you are a couple seeking complete privacy for a romantic getaway or you are planning a 14-person family reunion, a vacation at Solstice is a way to have fun while making the world a better place.

lenders.name: sukma
lenders.loan_because: As a freelancer sales, I want to have merchandise stock optimally. Until now I have gotten  the merchandise from buying at grocery agent or distributor branch, and a half of that from borrowing  from my friend in one day. And that merchandise is enough to carried  by my old motorbike once in a day. Sometimes merchandise which my customers need are not ready at grocery agent, distributor branch or my friend's store stock, so I can not work optimally the profit is fall. As long as I know, I need add more capital. That is why I need soft loan to leverage my work. Not only that, I can increase to get new customers again. The next, I can open a small store step by step, because I have a lot of merchandise stock. That is my dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work about 10 hours every day. I carry merchandise by my old motorbike go around my town and suburb. I call to my customers for selling. Every morning I take merchandise from my friend's store, then I go to some grocery agent and / or distributor branch to buying some merchandise which my customers need. After that I go to my customers outlet. Majority of my merchandise are snack, only a little of beverage, sometimes  bring some little toys too. Most of my customers market segment are children. Because the children have high frequency for buying them. In the afternoon  I come back to my boarding house, because I do not have  house. Every month  I pay a rent fee.Tomorrow morning I go to my friend's store for calculation how much the merchandise I brought yesterday sold, then I pay to my friend a sum of merchandise sold. I might take again some merchandise I need.

lenders.occupational_info: I deal with toys! 40 years ago my dad, by using ONLY his strenght and very few money he got, built a company producing plastic educational & school items: rulers, triangles, exc. Now he is still the boss, and we also produce plastic educational toys, artists products exc. My job consists in selling these items to foreign people.

lenders.loan_because: life is about lifting the human spirit . Many people wanting support simply require an opportunity and someone to invest in them. I feel it is an honor to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work as an administrator for a study abroad program. At a personal level, I have established a non profit organization to assist people learn about the disparities in the criminal justice system in the USA.

lenders.name: Emmanuel
lenders.loan_because: Currently I am engage in a website base enterprise Known as  "ENTREPRENEURS BUSINESS ALLIANCE IN THE PHILIPPINES" or eBAIPhils , I become interested t be part of KIVA to meet not only our finacial needs as a start- up company but most of all KIVA for us is indeed a promising partner in our business endeavor to help those SME's here in the Philippines particularly our Affiliates and or Alliances of Small medium enterprises.
lenders.occupational_info: Our Vision and mission is clear and it is define clearly in one perspective "to help" the entrepreneurs here in the Philippines in the field of our expertise. KIVA has meet this perspective perfectly align with us.

lenders.name: Nellie
lenders.loan_because: being a single mother with a celebral palsied son, i want to support our needs though i have a single son working and my two other married children  support us sometimes like our medicines for maintenance,foods,clothing etc. but does not enough, my active mind continue to work hard. i am now a single mother almost 8 years. i have still to continue to share my abilities, skills and talents, though i have some difficulties in my physical condition thinking that the worst is yet to come, i have to help people likewise myself and my son who is my responsibility. He is a bedridden 20 years old boy.Life goes on, we need to survive, i want to find a ways and means not begging for a long practical help from concerned community.i want to build my own concerned community those been affected any sort of survival.
lenders.occupational_info: most of my time staying always at home,doing spirituality on line, i want to create a business on line. i have a community movement in our church related to the families - socio environment; socio-economics and spiritual awareness.
